name: Eustass "Captain" Kid
text: End of Your Turn: You may turn the top card of your Life cards face-up. Set up to one of your 3 to 8 cost characters with the (Supernova) type active, that character gains until the end of your opponent's next turn.

effect.text: You may turn the top card of your Life cards face-up. Set up to one of your 3 to 8 cost characters with the (Supernova) type active, that character gains until the end of your opponent's next turn.
